name: Levitation (V)
Lore: 'Telekinesis is one of the powers awakened during a Jedi''s apprenticeship. Using this ability, a student of the Force can learn to levitate objects.',
Text: 'USED: Take a droid or device from your Force Pile into hand; reshuffle.LOST: Once per game, if your apprentice is on Dagobah, cancel a Force drain at a non-Dagobah location.',
